description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry & Cucumber Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Strawberry & Cucumber Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large cucumber, halved lengthways, deseeded and thinly sliced
250g strawberries, halved or quartered if large

recipeInstructions.text: Put the cucumber slices and strawberry halves or quarters in a shallow bowl.
Put all the dressing ingredients in a screw-top jar, season to taste with salt and pepper, and shake well.
Pour the dressing over the cucumber and strawberries. Toss gently, then cover and chill for 5-10 minutes before serving.
